DOC.brief_title: Remote Ischemic Preconditioning Intracranial Aneurysm Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , randomize , double-blind , explorative single center clinical trial patient subject treatment un-ruptured intracranial aneurysm , either surgical clip endovascular coiling . Goal study determine whether remote ischemic preconditioning ( RIPC ) prior aneurysm treatment alters various biomarkers associate ischemic central neuronal tissue damage . The trial take place Innsbruck University Hospital Innsbruck Medical University , Innsbruck , Austria . Patients fulfil inclusion criterion randomly allocate either pre-interventional ischemic preconditioning ( Group A = intervention group ) sham preconditioning ( Group B = control group ) . RIPC perform inflate blood pressure cuff around one upper extremity three time five minute five minute interval patient general anesthesia prior start procedure . Patients , staff involve diagnosis treatment study member blind patient ' group affiliation . The anesthesiologist two staff member perform precondition blind . Primary outcome difference Â± 2SD concentration-time curve panel biochemical parameter indicative cerebral ischemia ( S100B , NSE , GFAP , MMP9 , MBP , microparticles ) first five day intervention . Secondary outcome parameter change post-interventional MRI neuropsychological clinical outcome six 12 month . CONSORT TIDieR guideline follow . The trail register public database . The trail protocol publish open-access journal .
